Build 20020411
Default browser: Netscape Communication 4.75

Consistently reproducible for me with the following steps:

1) Create a new simple project
2) Create an HTML file in that project
3) Close the editor that gets opened after step 2)
4) Select the project in navigator, Open in New Window
5) Double-click on HTML file in this new window:

NullPointerException occurs. Top of stack follows, complete stack attached:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.editorsupport.OleEditor.setFocus(OleEditor.java:523)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorPresentation.setVisibleEditor(EditorPresentation.j
ava:362)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorPresentation.openEditor(EditorPresentation.java:30
9)
Eduardo, could you please work with Veronika on this and bug 13198.

I fixed and released the NPE but I could not reproduce the problem.
Please reopen if you still have problems.
